name: Fix Car Turbo - Driving Simulator
description:
Fix Car Turbo - Driving Simulator is the most extreme real time car driving simulato. Drive a turbo sports car, crash it, drift it as fast as you can and burn the asphalt of the road with more people!!
Get ready to drive amazing sports car through dangerous and crazy path. Your target is to pass through the obstacles and reach at the finishing line. The amazing and crazy stunts will blow your mind. Car smashing machines and stunt environment make this game more interesting.
Features :
Various types of sports and stunt cars
Realistic 3D environments
Smooth and realistic controls
Fabulous sound effects
Very good and original game play
Real feeling of drive
Excellent physics graphics
